from um_kh_user u left join um_kh_department d on u.parentId=d.id AND u.parentClass='KhDepartment' left join um_kh_company c on u.companyId=c.id where u.companyId = #{companyId}

from um_kh_user u left join um_kh_department d on u.parentId=d.id AND u.parentClass='KhDepartment' left join um_kh_company c on u.companyId=c.id where u.parentId = #{departmentId} AND u.parentClass='KhDepartment'

um_kh_user u left join um_kh_company c on u.companyId=c.id
um_kh_user u left join um_kh_department c on u.parentId=c.id AND u.parentClass='KhDepartment'

FROM um_kh_user u left join um_kh_department d on u.parentId=d.id AND u.parentClass='KhDepartment' left join um_kh_company c on u.companyId=c.id WHERE u.mobile = #{mobile} and u.status <> 9

FROM um_kh_user u left join um_kh_department d on u.parentId=d.id AND u.parentClass='KhDepartment' left join um_kh_company c on u.companyId=c.id WHERE u.zwuid = #{zwuid} and u.status <> 9
